atk-abh03a58:1_0: Dukapaṭṭhānepi sabbadukesu pañhāvissajjanāni ceva gaṇanā ca pāḷiyaṁ āgatanayeneva
atk-abh03a58:1_3: Idaṁ dukaṁ yathā sappaccayadukaṁ, evaṁ kātabbanti idaṁ yasmā sappaccayo viya appaccayena
atk-abh03a58:1_4: saṅkhatopi, asaṅkhatena saddhiṁ yojanaṁ na labbhati, tasmā vuttaṁ. Sārammaṇacittasampayuttasaṁsaṭṭhadukāpi
atk-abh03a58:1_5: sadisavissajjanāyeva; tathā āsavaoghayogagocchakā. Ete hi tayo aññamaññaṁ sadisavissajjanāyeva.
atk-abh03a58:2_1: samānā. Tathākilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhanīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttakilesā ceva kilesasampayuttadukā.
atk-abh03a58:2_2: Iminā nayena sabbesaṁ atthato sadisānaṁ dukānaṁ vissajjanāni sadisāneva hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a58:2_3: Sabbasmimpi pana paṭṭhāne kenaciviññeyyadukaṁ na labbhati. Āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā
atk-abh03a58:2_4: ca, saṁyojanā ceva saṁyojanasampayuttā ca, ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca, nīvaraṇā
atk-abh03a58:2_5: ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā ca, kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā cāti evarūpesu dukesu vipākapaccayo
atk-abh03a58:2_6: ceva nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayo ca na labbhati. Nahetusahetukanahetuahetukesu hetupaccayo
atk-abh03a58:2_7: natthi. Hetū ceva hetusampayuttā ca, āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā ca, ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā
atk-abh03a58:2_8: cāti imesu dukesu nahetunajhānanamaggā na labbhanti. Saṁyojanā ceva saṁyojanasampayuttā
atk-abh03a58:2_9: ca, nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā ca, kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā ca, kilesā
atk-abh03a58:2_10: ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā cāti imesu pana vicikicchuddhaccasahagatassa mohassa vasena nahetupaccayo
atk-abh03a58:2_11: labbhati; najhānanamaggapaccayā na labbhantīti evaṁ sabbadukesu labbhamānālabbhamānaṁ
